import React from 'react'; import '../Css/MobileFilter.css'; import all from '../Images/5110770.png'; import MensSports from '../Images/MensSports.png'; import WomensSports from '../Images/WomenSports.png'; const SportsFilter = ({ selectedSubCategory, selectedPrice, onSubCategoryChange, onPriceChange }) => (
onSubCategoryChange('')}>
All Sports
onSubCategoryChange('Mens Sportswear')}>
Mens Sportswear
onSubCategoryChange('Womens Sportswear')}>
Womens Sportswear
onSubCategoryChange('Womens Sportswear')}>
Game Access
onPriceChange(parseInt(e.target.value, 10))} />
{selectedPrice} /-
); export default SportsFilter;
